about_the_game:
Operative Revolve is a cinematic roguelike deckbuilder with an unique gameplay mechanic. Play as Operatives, secret agents who oversee a world governed by machine ideology. Use your Machine cards that can physically attack or block damage, to battle enemies opposing your directive and uncover the hidden truths within the machinated world.



Each card can be upgraded by installing unique frame and wheel component. These component boasts its own distinct design and effects; Utilize them to optimize your cards and experiment with different gameplay strategy.




  • Dynamic Upgrades - Cards can be outfitted with effect-altering components, offering the potential to experiment with a huge variety of powerful strategies.



  • Destructible Cards - Cards destroyed in battle do not restore themselves until the next battle. They have their own unique health system, indicated by the number on their wheel and the type of wheel that changes how health is calculated.



  • Relics - Relics are artifacts in a briefcase that can either further improve your component-card combo or create new gameplay strategies.



  • Intense Combat - Featuring unique combat mechanics that alters gameplay mechanics.



  • Evolving Challenge - Enemies come in various forms and employ dynamic attack strategies. The set of behaviors can be rolled and remixed each run. They can be observed and analyzed, with adaptive complexity along the difficulty.
  • Replayability - Each run is different; pick 2 out of 6 Operatives to battle randomized enemies with evolving behaviors based on difficulty.
  • Multi-Directional - Cards are placed on either the left or right side, with enemy attacks coming from both directions. Each side represents an Operative's domain to guard against enemies.
  • Combination Deck - Each Operative has their own set of unique cards, designed to synergize differently when paired with a different Operative, resulting in up to 15 combination choices.
  • Optimization - Despite how it looks, this game is optimized to run smoothly on older devices. It's my goal to release the game along with steam deck verification.
  • More Features to Come - This solo-developed game is still in its early stages. Join our Discord to follow its growth and development!
    Discord and social media links are on the side bar of this page.

short_description: A cinematic roguelike deckbuilder where your cards are 'Machines' that activate physically. Enemies can strike, pierce, or bomb them into pieces. Install components to make your cards tough or dangerous, trigger chain reactions, and experiment with thrilling ways to destroy your enemies.
